title: Luxury Interior Finishes + Virtual Tour + Newer 2 Bedroom in Glendale
posting_body: ['Virtual Tour Unit 201: <URL>', 'Introducing the L Lofts Living Experience!', "Enjoy a newly built community with luxury amenities in a walkable/bike friendly neighborhood adjacent to Glendale's best restaurants, shopping and entertainment.", "L Lofts has 42 luxe units from studio's to dual level lofts in a complex that includes a plush garden courtyard with barbecue, a state-of- the-art gym, 5 theaters and a restaurant.", 'AMENITIES:', '- High-end Front Loading Washer & Dryer', '- UFC Sponsored Gym', '- Modern Stainless Steel Finish Appliances', '- 24-hour On-site Manager and Maintenance Personnel', '- Close Distance to All Major Restaurants and Shops', '- Nest Learning Thermostat', '- Balcony With Great Views in Select Units', '- Gated and Private Storage for Residents', '- Reserved and Gated Garage Parking', '- Two Community Courtyards With Furniture and Barbeque Grills', '- Natural Water Feature', '- Recessed LED Lights', '- Signature Luxury Interior Finishes', '- Bike Storage', '- Laemmle Theater and Panda Inn Restaurant Commercial Space On Premise', '- Built-in USB Outlets', '- Under Cabinet Strip Lights', '- Ground Floor Dining and Entertainment', '- Electric Vehicle Charging Station', '- Complimentary Wi-Fi Throughout Building', '- Community Fire Place With Benches', '- Controlled Access Building Entry', "- Chef's Island in Select Units", '- Large Walk-in Closets', '201-215 North Maryland Avenue', 'Glendale, CA', 'show contact info', 'Price & availability are subject to change.', 'Sq footage may not be exact.']
